Header.title: EDucated Guess
Header.paragraph: No job is too small, so please take a look at the services offered and give me a call.

About.paragraph:
I am a registered professional engineer with over 40 years in the manufacturing industry in executive positions.  I have been a handyman for most of my career, doing various basement renovations, bathroom renovations etc.  I have recently managed a complete renovation of a hair salon, undertaking a majority of the work myself (see the Gallery tab).  I have also upgraded my mother's house for resale recently, achieving an offer price far above asking.

In an attempt to help seniors stay in place, I am focusing my services to the seniors community, and offering my services for $40 per hour, plus. expenses (as approved) and HST.
Educated Guess is the "operating as" name for the Ontario incorporated company Blackburn Development Corporation.

Educated Guess has a $2 million general liability insurance policy in place, so that we are all protected.

Services.name: laundry room upgrades (cabinets, sinks, flooring etc)
power wash and stain decks and fences
tire replacement on site (winter and summer tires on rims)

Testimonials.name: Erin and Julie - Co-owners of The Fawn Collective
